txt.en: You have been tasked with investigating a fire in the Wildwood, then quickly returning to town.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Radhril for your reward!

'Would you accompany me on a mission, [placeholder]?

'The Free Peoples here have reported a fire in the Wildwood. I am bothered however, for I do not see any smoke rising from the woods.

'We should investigate this fire immediately and report back with our findings to those in Trestlebridge.'
A routine scouting expedition to investigate a fire in the Wildwood becomes a harrowing mission to save a town.\n\nYour mission is to investigate a fire in the Wildwood, then quickly return to town.
The monster commander in this mission has an aura that buffs any allies nearby.
Your mission is to investigate a fire in the Wildwood, then quickly return to town.\n\nSpeak to Radhril.

'We have done well, [placeholder]. With the ambush defeated, Trestlebridge is once again safe. All those in Trestlebridge are thankful that we returned to town when we did. The fire was certainly a distraction to lead us away from town.'
